headline: How Upgraded Guidance and Capital Returns at Viatris (VTRS) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Viatris Inc. recently reported strong third quarter 2025 results, raising its full-year guidance to US$13.9–14.3 billion in revenue and increasing anticipated adjusted earnings per share, supported by contributions from new products and the acquisition of Aculys Pharma. Management emphasized its ongoing pursuit of growth-focused mergers and acquisitions, while also reaffirming a commitment to shareholder returns through dividends and share repurchases exceeding US$920 million...
